documents.document: Unsure of the reason why I put off watching Sing Street for so long, but glad I now have.
People asking me the name of the trail: who do you think I am? Do I look like I know where I am or where I'm going?
The future is open wide.
Big fan of the snow thing.
Reasons to cry: someone walked into a good shot today and my subject, who was unaware, noticed.
Life is a stranger, and it won't go away.
So many things to do and to think about have been clouding my focus.
I'm also finding it incredibly hard to focus on the things I need to do.
Feeling slightly heavy hearted and a little bit exhausted.
I missed today's gorgeous golden hour because I was stuck in the library studying :(
I don't know why the Orion constellation holds so much meaning to me, and I don't know if I ever will.
pssssst, @njalii happy birthday.
@njalii since 1999, what's up welcome to the club.
To love is to destroy.
There is something about folk that tugs on my heart strings. Every note hits me like a wave of warmth.
Awake and dreaming.
I thought we could talk on darker days with our boots kicked off.
@njalii sounds about right, no probs. be safe tonight & have fun ðŸ’•
@njalii i got some if you need it
Will I ever not forget I my tea while I leave it brewing?
i was right.
boy am I going to be mad at myself when my alarm goes off in a few hours.
Always a favourite. https://t.co/HzvVwb7Nz5
@njalii your real-est tweet
Where are we? What do we do?
@njalii turned my world around with mac n' cheese
So many interesting topics will be discussed BUT I'd have to go to sleep RIGHT NOW, otherwise I won't wake up on time.
I don't know if I should go to the Humanities & Social Sciences conference tomorrow..
@njalii, @TheEconomist please.
Summary of the hockey game: @njalii and I missed a goal because we were talking about The Economist.
My dogspot has gained lots of attention. brb becoming a dog photographer.
I really enjoy having the house to myself because I can blast the Grease soundtrack to sing and dance my heart out.
Kinda getting tired of the amount of personal space that people need here. Like just get into my space a little, bug me, hug me.
@njalii my brai(si)n cannot think of anything funny to say. Here's an acknowledgement tweet, i love ya.
unpopular opinion: raisins are good.
I did read pretty thoroughly on how the system works so I have a broad understanding of it, so I guess that was good.
I took an enneagram test and it told me that it is unclear from my results which type I am.
I've been drinking more tea than coffee lately. If I'm not a coffee-drinking mess anymore, then who am I?
Came home for a few hours and was greeted with a "you look tired, you have dark circles under your eyes." https://t.co/aKM6SFgql7
Only heartbreak and heartache, and gin made of tears.
At least it will be snowing tomorrow.
My head hurts so much, I feel like crying.
This teapot + cup set left me wanting one for myself. https://t.co/7zbUrvjlnX
I guess at least people see me and think "Oh, she seems like a person who knows where she's going" enough to ask me for directions.
+ one more right as I was leaving my class.
I've been on campus for 15 mins and already got asked for directions twice.
@njalii my dad just asked me what I was giggling about, and I just said "trudeau" and all I got was a sigh as a response.
So much bubbly has been had, and life is good.
So, how's your new year going? https://t.co/8bOo3s75q7
Just an hour into 2017, and it already looks promising. Let's hope I don't fuck up!
And as we're 10 minutes away of ending 2016, I play Catan and listen to Rush. What a way to end the year.
I'm out for the night (probably.)So happy late and early new year to all of you who read the stupid things that come out of my head. Love ya
Did yoga with my sister and we took beer breaks, living the life much?
Going to try to fall asleep now. I'm out.
Twitter translations are terrible. I want to apologize to my english speaking followers. I promise I sort of make sense in Spanish.
One day I'm going to Henry David Thoreau-Walden Pond the shit out of life.
There's nothing else to say. https://t.co/CAvi046rUB
I'm heading out REALLY early tomorrow morning, but I can't fall asleep. Why am I like this?
If there's someone out there who wants someone to watch Gilmore Girls with for the first time, I'd be willing to watch it for the 4th time.
@njalii i'd rt, but u private.
It is almost 5am and I haven't slept, for some reason this song won't leave my head. https://t.co/wUmNVXW64T
I've had a consistent headache for the past 4 hours. I feel like crying. Someone make it stop.
The pages, they turn when you come to stay.
A great one has passed today. Rest easy, Subiela. https://t.co/Rz0xw8j0Pv
Flour-y hands. https://t.co/2iibDAVSW1
Never play Risk with your family. It brings out the worst in everyone.
So much is going on. My brain hurts. This family is tearing itself apart. I need a nap. https://t.co/7txACx49cf
Cooking with my mom means drinking wine + acting movie-like sob scenes when cutting onions + saying really stupid shit.
I need a change of pace and scenery.
Everyone is leaving Vancouver and I'm stuck here until the 29th :(
Fun fact: I didn't know how to write Christmas properly until I was in like 5th grade, lol.
Wait, so people celebrate Christmas on the 25th instead of celebrating it on the 24th?
I want to formally apologize to all of the neighbours who can hear me singing my lungs out to Sarah Jaffe's Suburban Nature.
Gonna put some Sarah Jaffe on and feel sorry for myself, bye.
I forgot my wallet at home and the movie theatre need to prove that I was 19+. Had to come back home while my family stayed for Rogue One.
Hint: @sam_matute
Guess who's an idiot?
Shadows and light conspiring.
I'm stressed out and I don't know why.
The new owners renovated, and it's not pretty anymore :/
Today I found out that the old french couple who owned CrÃªpe & CafÃ© sold their coffee shop, and that makes me sad.
I will never understand how people can get into bed and fall asleep in less than one minute. It takes me forever to fall asleep.
Just realized I wrote 'are' twice. I'm a failure.
Am I pretentious for drinking wine out of a jam jar? Or are all of my other glasses are dirty? You decide. https://t.co/2JjKkqZUx9
I love seeing rooms full of plants through people's windows.
My 8:30 am exam was cancelled. Let's celebrate by going immediately back to bed.
It's been a really long time since I last read it, and I can't wait to revisit my favourite book.
I can't wait to be done with my last final tomorrow so that I can start reading Portrait in Sepia.
Maybe even 5-6. Who cares.
Like 3-4 movies in a row kinda thing.
To be honest I'm so tired I kinda just want to watch movies and cuddle in the sofa.
Got bored of my readings so I decided to watch Kung Fury. As one does.
I've got a final on Monday and there is no way that I'm going to get anything done while at home with everyone here.
tired, but happy. happily tired.
About to enter an economics final, and I can hear a group of people talking about Black Ops. Mechanisms of coping with stress are funny.
I can almost feel the length of 2016 when I think about how it was in January that This Is Acting by Sia came out.
Totally did not use her being done with finals as an excuse to drink wine and eat chocolates.
Surprised my friend with wine and chocolates cause she's done with finals. Sad thing is that I'm not even close to done yet.
Even though I don't have headphones, I keep music in my phone just in case I'm given the aux cord. You gotta be ready to educate the masses.
I just watched Eddie The Eagle while wearing this jumper and now I'm ready to go to a ski competition in the 80s. https://t.co/zVDKciOcqo
